## Generator.STATEMENT\_SUFFIX property

Arbitrary code to inject after every statement. Any instances of '%1' will be replaced by the block ID of the statement. E.g. `highlight(%1);\n`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
STATEMENT_SUFFIX: string | null;
```
